general.title: Concentration Tests
general.description: Tests for improving and checking concentration and memory.

home.title: Home
home.instructions_1: Hello! I have put together some concentration and memory exercises on this website.
home.instructions_2: You can access the different exercises via the navigation above.
home.instructions_3: Please send inquiries of any kind to the e-mail address in the legal notice:

ctweber.title: CT Weber
ctweber.instructions_1: Specify the number of images to show and the duration to show each images.
ctweber.instructions_2: When an images is shown, press either "1" or "0" on your keyboard.
ctweber.instructions_3: If your decision was correct, you get a point.
ctweber.instructions_4: Only the first key you press per image is counted.
ctweber.total_time: Your test will take a total of {seconds} seconds.

simplemaths.title: Mental Calculation
simplemaths.instructions_1: Specify how many rounds you want to play and how many expressions should be displayed at once in each round.
simplemaths.instructions_2: In addition, specify how many addends each expression should consist of and how large the individual addends may be at most.
simplemaths.instructions_3: For each correctly solved expression you get one point.
simplemaths.instructions_4: The time is tracked in the background. With the tab key you can quickly switch through the individual expressions.
simplemaths.total_terms: The test will have {terms} expressions in total.

wordsbackwards.title: Words Backwards
wordsbackwards.instructions_1: Specify how many words to display and the maximum length of each word.
wordsbackwards.instructions_2: When a word appears, type it backwards into the input field and press "Next" or the Enter key.
wordsbackwards.instructions_3: For each word spelled exactly right backwards, you get one point.
wordsbackwards.instructions_4: The time is tracked in the background.
wordsbackwards.max_characters: Maximum number of letters per word
